question: Who has been appointed as the ex-IB chief?
explanation: Dineshwar Sharma, the Former director of the Intelligence Bureau (IB) taken charge as the interlocutor, for peace talks with Assam's insurgent groups, including the United Liberation Front of Assam (ULFA). He addressed to the media that the rank of the former IB Director, Dineshwar Sharma, will be equivalent to that of a Cabinet Secretary. The appointment of Dineshwar Sharma and intention towards the unrest prevailing in Jammu and Kashmir.
